name.task.description: Type of Nano Banana image operation

name.nanobananaBot.description: Name of the Nano Banana image generator

name.aspectRatio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated image

description.prompt.message: Prompt words for generating or editing images

description.imageUrls.message: You must upload 1-5 images for the edit image task.

description.aspectRatio.message: Aspect ratio of the generated image. Supported values are `1:1`, `3:2`, `2:3`, `16:9`, `9:16`, `4:3`, `3:4`. The default value is `1:1`. This only takes effect when `action` is `generate`; if `action` is `edit`, the ratio of the first image in `image_urls` will be used.

placeholder.prompt.message: Enter prompt, e.g., a white siamese cat

message.startingTask.description: Message indicating the task is starting

message.startTaskFailed.message: Failed to initiate task, please contact the administrator:

message.usedUp.message: Your credits have been used up, please purchase more credits to continue using

message.uploadImageExceed.message: You can upload a maximum of 5 images
message.uploadImageExceed.description: Message indicating the number of images exceeds the limit

message.uploadImageError.message: Failed to upload image, please try again later
